content: SID 2-A12 Cordless impact driver Subcompact-class 12V brushless impact driver for when you need high torque with access and low weight ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Impact drivers and wrenches- - - ### FEATURES:Features More compact than ever – the cordless impact driver for working in cramped or hard-to-reach spaces Minimized weight – designed especially for working overhead or at awkward angles Upgraded ergonomics – fits firmly in your grip, for more comfortable handling and precise control Outsized performance – powerful 2750 rpm drilling speed and up to 170 Nm rated torque, despite the minimized tool size and weight Brushless motor – virtually maintenance-free to minimize tool downtime Applications Driving small-diameter, self-drilling screws up to 22 mm length in metal Driving drywall screws Driving screws in HRD frame anchors up to 8 mm diameter in masonry and concrete Driving sharp-point wood fasteners up 6 mm ### TECHNICAL DATA: Chuck type: 1/4 hexagonal Feature: LED light , LED light around the chuck No load RPM: gear 1: 2750 rpm Technical Data | Feature | LED light , LED light around the chuck | Chuck type | 1/4 hexagonal | No load RPM | gear 1: 2750 rpm | Maximum torque | 1593 in-lb (1) | 1 | Full hammering frequency | 3988 impacts/minute | Number of gears | 1 | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 5.4 x 2.7 x 7 in | Tool body weight | 1.6 lb | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 97 dB (A) | 2 | Do not use the tool for applications where an exact torque or maximum torque is specified - there is a risk of over-tightening and damaging the screw or workpiece. | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3536724 - SID 2-A Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SID 2-A12 Cordl. impact driver - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 1x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 2x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x S Soft Pouch - 2200201 - SID 2-A - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SID 2-A12 Cordl. impact driver
